Hey y’all! It was great to see so many of you out this week for our event sponsored by HostGator.

Many thanks to Erik Gomez from Pinterest and Joel Rennich of Trusource Labs for sharing some of the amazing things they’re working on.

If you would like to provide feedback on the event, please email events@austinappleadmins.org.

If you would like to host an upcoming meetup, please fill out the Hosting Form.

If you would like to speak at an upcoming meetup, please fill out the Speaking Form.

Upcoming programming note

Our next event will be our Second Anniversary Happy Hour, tentatively set to happen on June 14th, 2017, at The Beer Plant. Stay tuned for more information.

See y’all next time!
